title: Webcam, why?
body: So uh, can someone from Riot support explain why the client now uses the webcam? I found this out when the system alerted me. But, there is literally no feature of league that would use the webcam and I highly doubt there ever will be, so what gives?

replies.body:
The short answer is it shouldn't. I would very much question why you are getting a permission request, and I would certainly decline it/prevent that access.

If you submit a ticket to player support they may be able to give you some insight if it *is* something unintentionally caused by League, but it could also be something spoofing itself as League. I would certainly run an anti-virus scan as well.

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I know it is league because I get the notification every time I open the client. Will send in the ticket now, thanks for info.
